Posts.EditableText: Since my laptop went blitzkrieg, I've used computer at library.  I didn't even know the smileys were animated or even avatars were (like tr0n's)!  That's how old that laptop was.  I'm looking forward to what ever else I've been missing out on.  New computer on the way! :}
Posts.HTML: Since my laptop went blitzkrieg, I've used computer at library.  I didn't even know the smileys were animated or even avatars were (like tr0n's)!  That's how old that laptop was.  I'm looking forward to what ever else I've been missing out on.  New computer on the way! :}
